name: LD47 - Singularity
description:
We have been stuck in this singularity for as long as I can remember.

Every time, the same thing happens, the singularity collapses, resetting the loop.

Recently, one of our scientists discovered that injecting different elements into our fuel can give the ship enough power to move around in short bursts.

Although the pull from the singularity is still too strong to blast our way out, there is hope that by using the gravity from surrounding asteroids we might be able to slingshot ourselves free.
